title: (x) Rotwild logo - custom (similar to Trican) {Romesh}
content:
I know this is a font that has been customized, I just don't know which font it is.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124625im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33683.jpg)
author: cannon46

comments.content:
I can't find a good match, and I don't think it's a real stencil font, because an O would need some support, if it were a true stencil. What I did was try to find a slab serif that was somewhat square and then simulate this logo (with an upside-down M for a W, and some clumsy outline manipulations in Illustrator). Here's the result of using Red Rooster's Equestrienne Heavy:   
 ![Equestrienne Sim for Rotwild](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124625im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33691.gif)

this logo is custom drawn by the ad-agency simon&goetz ( [http://www.simongoetz.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124625/http:/www.simongoetz.de/))   
   
dirk uhlenbrock made a similar freefont "trican" unfortunately its not longer for download but you might contact dirk.   
 [http://www.fontomas.com/18/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124625/http:/www.fontomas.com/18/index.html)
